description: This file defines a record class 'GrievanceCreateRequest' used to encapsulate data for creating a grievance or ticket within the airport facility service platform. It includes fields like passengerId, bookingId, category, subject, description, and priority, with validation and schema annotations.

classes.name: GrievanceCreateRequest
classes.description: A record class representing a request to create a grievance, including validation constraints and schema annotations for API documentation.
